description: This file contains functions and definitions for managing OVSDB tables, including initialization, JSON conversion, querying, insert/update/delete operations, and monitoring. It implements a wrapper around OVSDB interactions, supporting filtering, upsert, mutate, and callback handling for table updates.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_init(char * table_name,ovsdb_table_t * table,int schema_size,int upd_type_offset,int uuid_offset,int version_offset,schema_from_json_t * from_json,schema_to_json_t * to_json,schema_mark_changed_t * mark_changed,char ** columns)
methods.description: Initializes an OVSDB table structure with specified schema and callback functions.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_table_filter_row(json_t * row,char * columns[])
methods.description: Filters a JSON row based on specified '+' or '-' columns for inclusion/exclusion.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_from_json(ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * jrow,void * record)
methods.description: Parses a JSON object into a table record using a provided from_json function.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_table_to_json(ovsdb_table_t * table,void * record)
methods.description: Converts a record to JSON using the provided to_json function.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_table_to_json_f(ovsdb_table_t * table,void * record,char * filter[])
methods.description: Converts a record to JSON and applies filtering of columns.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_table_where(ovsdb_table_t * table,void * record)
methods.description: Constructs a JSON where clause based on record's key if defined.

methods.name: void * onewifi_ovsdb_table_select_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * where,int * count)
methods.description: Selects rows from the table matching where conditions and returns pointer to records.

methods.name: void * onewifi_ovsdb_table_select(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,char * column,char * value,int * count)
methods.description: Selects rows based on a simple column-value condition.

methods.name: void * onewifi_ovsdb_table_select_typed(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,char * column,ovsdb_col_t col_type,void * value,int * count)
methods.description: Selects rows based on a typed column-value condition.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_select_one_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * where,void * record)
methods.description: Selects a single row matching the where condition.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_select_one(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,const char * column,const char * value,void * record)
methods.description: Selects one row matching a column-value pair.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_insert(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,void * record)
methods.description: Inserts a new record into the table.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_delete_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * where)
methods.description: Deletes rows matching the where condition.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_delete_simple(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,const char * column,const char * value)
methods.description: Deletes rows matching a simple column-value condition.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_delete(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,void * record)
methods.description: Deletes specific record(s) based on record key.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_update_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * where,void * record)
methods.description: Updates rows matching the where condition with new record data.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_update_simple_f(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,char * column,char * value,void * record,char * filter[])
methods.description: Updates rows matching a simple condition, with optional filtering.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_update_simple(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,char * column,char * value,void * record)
methods.description: Updates rows matching a simple condition.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_update(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,void * record)
methods.description: Updates record(s) based on primary key or all if no key.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_upsert_where_f(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * where,void * record,bool update_uuid,char * filter[])
methods.description: Performs an upsert (update or insert) on rows matching a where condition.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_upsert_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * where,void * record,bool update_uuid)
methods.description: Performs an upsert based on where condition.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_upsert_simple_f(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,char * column,char * value,void * record,bool update_uuid,char * filter[])
methods.description: Upsert using a simple column-value condition.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_upsert_simple(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,char * column,char * value,void * record,bool update_uuid)
methods.description: Upsert using a simple column-value condition without filtering.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_upsert_f(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,void * record,bool update_uuid,char * filter[])
methods.description: Upsert based on primary key, or insert if not found.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_upsert(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,void * record,bool update_uuid)
methods.description: Upsert using primary key.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_mutate_uuid_set(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * where,char * column,ovsdb_tro_t op,char * uuid)
methods.description: Mutates a UUID set in a row.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_upsert_with_parent_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * where,void * record,bool update_uuid,char * filter[],char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,char * parent_column)
methods.description: Upsert with parent table context and a where clause.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_upsert_with_parent(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,void * record,bool update_uuid,char * filter[],char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,char * parent_column)
methods.description: Upsert with parent context.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_delete_where_with_parent(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * where,char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,char * parent_column)
methods.description: Deletes rows with parent table context.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_monitor_columns(int ovsdb_fd,ovsdb_table_t * table,ovsdb_table_callback_t * callback,char ** columns)
methods.description: Sets up a monitor for specified columns in the table.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_monitor(int ovsdb_fd,ovsdb_table_t * table,ovsdb_table_callback_t * callback,bool ignore_version)
methods.description: Sets up a monitor for all columns or ignored version.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_table_monitor_filter(int ovsdb_fd,ovsdb_table_t * table,ovsdb_table_callback_t * callback,char ** filter)
methods.description: Sets up a monitor with column filtering.

methods.name: void onewifi_ovsdb_table_update_cb(ovsdb_update_monitor_t * self)
methods.description: Callback invoked when a table update is received, processes the update JSON and invokes registered callbacks.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_update_f(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,void * record,char * filter[])
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_table_update_where_f(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_table_t * table,json_t * where,void * record,char * filter[])
methods.description: unavailable
